20110111235216.000|20110111235218.000|CC1|      that you need help.       
20110111235218.000|20110111235220.000|CC1|That's the day you do something.
20110111235220.000|20110111235222.000|CC1|       Depression hurts.        
20110111235222.000|20110111235222.000|CC1|  Cymbalta can help with many   
20110111235222.000|20110111235225.000|CC1|    symptoms of depression.     
20110111235225.000|20110111235225.000|CC1| Tell your doctor right away if 
20110111235225.000|20110111235228.000|CC1|    your depression worsens,    
20110111235228.000|20110111235228.000|CC1|  you have unusual changes in   
20110111235228.000|20110111235230.000|CC1|behavior or thoughts of suicide.
20110111235230.000|20110111235230.000|CC1|  Antidepressants can increase  
20110111235230.000|20110111235230.000|CC1| these in children, teens, and  
20110111235230.000|20110111235234.000|CC1|         young adults.          
20110111235234.000|20110111235234.000|CC1|  Cymbalta is not approved for  
20110111235234.000|20110111235236.000|CC1|       children under 18.       
20110111235236.000|20110111235236.000|CC1|     People taking MAOIs or     
20110111235236.000|20110111235239.000|CC1|          thioridazine          
20110111235239.000|20110111235239.000|CC1| or with uncontrolled glaucoma  
20110111235239.000|20110111235241.000|CC1|   should not take Cymbalta.    
20110111235241.000|20110111235241.000|CC1|   Taking it with NSAID pain    
20110111235241.000|20110111235243.000|CC1|           relievers,           
20110111235243.000|20110111235243.000|CC1| aspirin, or blood thinners may 
20110111235243.000|20110111235246.000|CC1|    increase bleeding risk.     
20110111235246.000|20110111235246.000|CC1|  Severe liver problems, some   
20110111235246.000|20110111235248.000|CC1|     fatal, were reported.      
20110111235248.000|20110111235248.000|CC1|Signs include abdominal pain and
20110111235248.000|20110111235251.000|CC1| yellowing of the skin or eyes. 
20110111235251.000|20110111235251.000|CC1|Talk with your doctor about your
20110111235251.000|20110111235253.000|CC1|           medicines,           
20110111235253.000|20110111235253.000|CC1|including those for migraine, or
20110111235253.000|20110111235256.000|CC1|    if you have high fever,     
20110111235256.000|20110111235257.000|CC1|  confusion and stiff muscles,  
20110111235257.000|20110111235257.000|CC1|     to address a possible      
20110111235257.000|20110111235259.000|CC1|  life-threatening condition.   
20110111235259.000|20110111235259.000|CC1| Tell your doctor about alcohol 
20110111235259.000|20110111235302.000|CC1|      use, liver disease,       
20110111235302.000|20110111235302.000|CC1| and before you reduce or stop  
20110111235302.000|20110111235304.000|CC1|        taking Cymbalta.        
20110111235304.000|20110111235304.000|CC1|Dizziness or fainting may occur 
20110111235304.000|20110111235306.000|CC1|         upon standing.         
20110111235306.000|20110111235306.000|CC1|Side effects include nausea, dry
20110111235306.000|20110111235310.000|CC1|    mouth, and constipation.
